name: Labyrinth (itch) (Cscopetski)
description:
Goal

Fight your way through 3 floors of randomly generated mazes to get to floor 4 where the Minotaur boss awaits you. Get gold and arrows, upgrade your weapons, collect potions, equip armor, and do everything you can to destroy him!

Tutorial Keybinds

Use WASD to move

Use E to interact

Use 1, 2, 3 to changes weapons/items in hotbar

Click to attack



Mechanics Doors

When you see a door, press E on it to go to the next floor

Chests

In the shops, you can walk up to the chests and they will preview the item that is in it. If you press E on the shop, the chest will turn red if you can't afford the item. If you can afford the item you will purchase the item when E is pressed.

In the dungeon, when pressing E on chests you will be given the item either way.

If you already have the item or a better item, the chest will reward you with gold and arrows.

Item rarity is shown by the particles on the chest.

Common Chest
Shop Price: 20 Gold

Uncommon Chest
Shop Price: 40 Gold

Rare Chest
Shop Price: 60 Gold

Legendary Chest
Shop Price: 80 Gold

Shop

Every so often you will find a shop in the dungeon, here you can walk over the chests to see what items are in the chests and attempt to purchase the items. Item prices are unknown! Good luck!

Upgrading

The upgrade NPC is located at the start and whenver you die. Die strategically to upgrade your stats, do gold runs!

Upgrade NPC

Damage multiplier

Health

Strength

Movement Speed

Armor



Credits
